channel.title: Site on Rahul Rameshbabu
channel.description: Recent content in Site on Rahul Rameshbabu

item.title: Site theme change
item.description: Why I changed the theme of my site? When I first started this page, I built my own theme hugo-theme-ghci based on the work done on the hugo-theme-ghci theme. I did this because I dislike the idea of using someone else's creative work to express myself on a personal site. I am really thankful to people who share themes for this purpose. I just thought back then I could make something more creative that expresses my interests.
